text:
@Mike_Pence Your failed admin killed 140,000+ Americans due to your complete failure dealing with covid19; your attempt to invalidate Obamacare protections for tens of millions of Americans with preexisting conditions.

You're not pro-life. You're a death cult intent on power and control.
